src:
Tramp pozvao lidere ASEAN-a u SAD

04 Nov 2019, 06:55

Predsednik SAD Donald Tramp pozvao je lidere zemalja jugoistočne Azije na "specijalni samit" u SAD početkom sledeće godine, nakon što nije otišao na njihov tekući redovni samit na Tajlandu.Trampov savetnik za nacionalnu bezbednost Robert O'Brajen koji predstavlja SAD na samitu Asocijacije zemalja jugoistočne Azije (ASEAN), uključio je taj poziv u Trampovo pismo koje je pročitao na današnjem sastanku s liderima ASEAN na marginama samita.Na tom sastanku obično prisustvuju predsednici ili premijeri država. Ipak, pridržavajući se diplomatskog protokola, sedam od 10 država ASEAN je na sastanak s američkim predstavnikom poslalo ministre spoljnih poslova.Sastanku su prisustvovali premijeri domaćina skupa Tajlanda, Vijetnama i Laosa.SAD je na prošlom samitu ASEAN predstavljao potpredsednik Majk Pens. Ove godine je pored O'Brajena u Bangkok doputovao i ministar trgovine Vilbur Ros.Nedolazak Trampa na samit otvorio je prostor za druge regionalne sile poput Kine, Indije i Japana, čiji premijeri su se sastali sa svojim kolegama.ASEAN čine Indonezija, Kambodža, Laos, Mjanmar, Brunej, Malezija, Filipini, Singapur, Tajland i Vijetnam.
text:
Trump calls on ASEAN leaders in the US

04 Nov 2019, 05:55

US President Donald Trump has called on Southeast Asian leaders for a "special summit" in the United States early next year after not attending their ongoing regular summit in Thailand.Tramp national security adviser Robert O'Brien representing the United States at the Southeast Asian Nations Summit Asia (ASEAN), included that invitation in Trump's letter, which he read at today's meeting with ASEAN leaders on the sidelines of the summit.This meeting is usually attended by presidents or prime ministers of states. However, adhering to the diplomatic protocol, seven of ASEAN's 10 countries sent foreign ministers to the meeting with the US representative. The meeting was attended by the Prime Ministers of the Thailand, Vietnam and Laos Summit. This year, in addition to O'Brien, Commerce Minister Wilbur Ros arrived in Bangkok. Trump's non-attendance at the summit opened the door for other regional powers such as China, India and Japan, whose prime ministers met with their counterparts. ASEAN consists of Indonesia, Cambodia, Laos , Myanmar, Brunei, Malaysia, Philippines, Singapore, Thailand and Vietnam.
